thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com | 17 of 97
thread.title: Laurie

author: Laurie
title: Laurie
text: I have never purchased a used book online before. I wanted a collection of poetry that was out of print, and Biblio had it. Their descriptions of the conditions of their books and the price points were very helpful. I got exactly what I wanted and felt I got more than what I paid for! The book was in really good condition, and better than that, the recipient was delighted to receive it.
